code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../style/css/style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PolaroidGallery=_ref=>{let{photos}=_ref;const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(photos.length-1);const swipePolaroid=direction=>{const newPolaroids=[...photos];newPolaroids[currentIndex].url+=" swipe-".concat(direction);setTimeout(()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex-1+photos.length)%photos.length);},300);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gallery",children:photos.map((photo,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"polaroid ".concat(index===currentIndex?'active':''),onClick:()=>swipePolaroid('left'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"frame",style:{width:'302px',height:'302px',border:'1px solid orange'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(photo.url,")")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:photo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:photo.date})]},index))});};export default PolaroidGallery;
